channel.title: I need help with torso glitch
channel.description:
if you can help with the glitch i have it would help so much, thanks.
[img]http://img395.imageshack.us/img395/9115/torsoglitchzf1.png[/img]
the glitch is that the " torso" doesnt cover the shoulders as if the cololor of my shirt is black so thats where the black shoders are coming in and no i didnt make the torso so i wouldnt know how its poorley made and it wasnt like that when just till today. if you tell me how to make it "cover the whole chest and shoulder it would help".

item.title: I need help with torso glitch
item.dc:creator: @Mary_Jane Mary|Jane
item.description:
@Mary_Jane wrote:

[quote=“Xx R A G 3 R, post:6, topic:196719”]Wait dont listen to those people…

  1. Go into your item4
  2. Go to public int platebody
  3. Add the item id of the torso, 14638 at the very end of the platebody’s ex: ,14638}[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with torso glitch
item.dc:creator: @justin95123 justin95123
item.description:
@justin95123 wrote:

What’s wrong with it?..The shoulders are black? Or is that your char. If the shoulders are black, then it is your client, elsewhere nothing is wrong with it. If it is just the blackness of your character, Then the torso was poorly made :S
Meaning there is no shoulders, If you want it to look better change the shirt to grey
You always can put an item as a ring, choose one that is grey, it will fix up the shoulder hopefully…
EDIT:it will really help if you told us what the glitch was, so this isn’t a guessing game

Read full topic
